3: Based on the coordinate information obtained, this should where the ninth original memory data is located.
Nothing, Commandant. I was just thinking that the battle was coming to an end.
I just... start to feel a bit lonely...
I'm not going to take back my comment of 'not like a real hero story,' but it's not a bad one either.
It's a bit weird. We weren't supposed to have so many feelings about our missions.
Perhaps they are too detached from reality.
It's another ideal that doesn't belong to our time, real and illusory at the same time.
It's a bit surprising that this comes from you.
Indeed.
That's it, Lee. Be prepared to activate the tactical terminal.
Roger.
I wonder what kind of person we'll meet this time...
The memory prototype this time is called Catherine. A large part of the data about her is missing. The only information we have now is that she had the ability of healing before.
I'm Catherine, the lord of the Rose Garden. Glad to meet all of you. Sorry to keep you waiting.
Good to see you.
So are you already aware of our mission and purpose?
I'm sorry. Perhaps I've been living in the darkness for too long. It's a bit uncomfortable stepping into the bright sunlight.
I used to fear the darkness and constriction. But I knew that everything would be just fine.
Speaking of which, you remind me of a long-lost friend.
Mr. Commandant, if you fight for me, I'll do everything I can to protect you.
Ah, forget about it. It's just the moment I saw you...
I don't know why, but I just wanna say this to you... one more time.
...Commandant?
Miss Catherine, we have something to ask you.
Will you join and help us from now on?
It would be better... if there's no research or experiments...
Of course, my pleasure. As for research and experiments, I'm not made for that. Besides...
Miss Lucia, you'd be a lot more adorable if you stop being so tense.
I see... I'll try.
Doesn't seem like it.
Doesn't matter, we've got time.
Here are some scarlet petals for you. May your dreams one day be fulfilled.
Done. Memory: Catherine. Test passed and recycle completed.
